bibl.title: Documentary Evidence for the Chronology of the Flavian Titulature. (Beiträge zur Klassischen Philologie. Heft 112.)
bibl.note: "My purpose has been to construct chronological Tables by means of an over-all coordination of the epigraphical, numismatic and papyrological material, and to indicate, hopefully to correct, documents which have been misread or wrongly restored."
Buttrey T.V., Documentary Evidence for the Chronology of the Flavian Titulature. (Beiträge zur Klassischen Philologie. Heft 112.)
Meisenheim am Glan, A. Hain, 1980, 8°, vi-64 pp. et 2 pll.
